news.name: News / Magazine
news.short_description: Everything you'll need to build a dynamic and engaging news site.
news.description: This News/Magazine Kit provides all the Building Blocks you'll need to keep your site ahead of the trend. We've included highly customizable Building Blocks, from a navigation bar that responsively hides links to various media inserts for articles, to make your content stand out.

blocks.name: JSON-Powered Update Feed
blocks.description: If you need an easy way to consume JSON or RSS and show as a feed, here's the ticket.
